word: "These are not the words of him that hath a devil. Can a devil open the eyes of the blind? . . . And Jesus walked in the temple in Solomon's porch. Then came the Jews round about him, and said unto him, How long dost thou make us to doubt? If thou be the Christ, tell us plainly. Jesus answered them, I told you, and ye believed not. . . . My sheep hear my voice, and I know them, and they follow me. . . . I and my Father are one."
